short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses the Boxleiter Method to calculate and visualize Steam games' gross revenue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the Steam store, visualize the estimated gross revenue of games.

Revenue is estimated using the Boxleiter method as follows:
[REVENUE] = [TOTAL REVIEWS] * [FULL PRICE] * [DEFAULT PRICE DISCOUNT = 0.8] * [BOXLEITER NUMBER = 35]
